job_description: Debugged and resolved complex Python coding challenges to improve AI model training.
Demonstrated eagerness to learn by participating in group hackathons and completing individual full-stack projects, enhancing collaboration, innovation, and problem-solving skills.
Leveraged Python skills to develop scripts for automating amplifier testing and report generation, with technical documentation achieving a turnaround time of 2 weeks.
Executed cross-functional collaboration and contributed clean, readable code to Bitbucket.
Managed Git repositories and maintained Git branches, ensuring version control.
Leveraged Python skills to develop scripts to automate radio testing.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams for effective testing.
Accountable for reporting testing roadblocks in Jira, facilitating effective communication with software teams to identify and resolve issues promptly.
Wore multiple hats to manage project timelines, budgets, and resources to keep projects on track in a fast-paced startup with an innovative mindset.
Demonstrated a high level of ownership, responsibility, and autonomy in driving complex, innovative engineering solutions from concept to execution.
Collaborated with Indian and Canadian cross-functional teams to design and optimize microwave filters and multiplexers for satellite payloads.
Solved complex design and simulation challenges using in-house software and HFSS, ensuring timely completion of projects within budgetary constraints.
